## PolyAsyncIterable.forEach() method

Call a function for each element of `this` iteration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
forEach(func: AsyncIndexedRunnable<T>, options?: ConcurrencyOptions): Promise<void>;
```

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options for concurrency of this operation

Promise&lt;void&gt;
